text: This Privacy Policy describes how Workvivo Limited ("us", "we", or "our") collects, uses, discloses, transfers, stores, retains or otherwise processes your information and the ways that you can manage how your personal data is used, including the right to object to certain types of processing (see Your Rights below for more information on your rights as a data subject).
